description: I. TOWARDS A NUCLEAR NATIONAL POLICY STATEMENT. Government response to consultations on the Strategic Siting Assessment process and siting criteria for new nuclear power stations in the UK; and to the study on the potential environmental and sustainability effects of applying the criteria. 126 p. II. TOWARDS A NUCLEAR NATIONAL POLICY STATEMENT. Applying the Strategic Siting Assessment Criteria: an update to the study of the potential environmental and sustainability effects. 43 p.
department: Dept of Energy and Climate Change
